scripts.start: npm run build-sass && npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run watch-sass"
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify -p esmify -p common-shakeify -t unassertify -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.test-cypress: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "budo src/index.js:bundle.js --dir=public/ --port=9966 --live --pushstate -- -p esmify -dv" "cypress open"
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run deps
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
